scripts.regen: rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm clean:modules && corepack use pnpm@latest
scripts.release: pnpm release:version && pnpm build && pnpm standard-version -a -s
scripts.release:alpha: pnpm release:version --preid alpha && pnpm build && pnpm standard-version -a -s --prerelease alpha --skip.changelog
scripts.release:beta: pnpm release:version --preid beta && pnpm build && pnpm standard-version -a -s --prerelease beta --skip.changelog
scripts.release:publish: pnpm release:publish:build && pnpm -r publish --access public --no-git-checks --tag latest && pnpm release:clean
scripts.release:publish:alpha: pnpm release:publish:build && pnpm -r publish --access public --no-git-checks --tag alpha && pnpm release:clean
scripts.release:publish:beta: pnpm release:publish:build && pnpm -r publish --access public --no-git-checks --tag beta && pnpm release:clean
scripts.pre-commit: pnpm check && pnpm check:types && pnpm check:circular-deps && pnpm knip:check
